channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:33 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:33 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:33 WARNING! DROVIA DRONNES-Kamikadze
item.description: 游릭 09:33 WARNING! DROVIA DRONNES-Kamikadze #m_nikopol_ti_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
